column4: I'm unable to connect to Windows SMB share from linux, despite all ports opened and smbclient etc. installed, it rejects my password or give 'LOGON_FAILURE' if coneected via terminal, what can be a reson?
one thought : you have username & password matching the one you have on your ubuntu machine ?
only rejects via terminal and not via nautilus ?
Nautilus asking for password constantly, and smbclient gives ...LOGON_FAILURE errer
replacing "workgroup_name" with the one you are using of course ?
yes, do you see I'v used \\MSHOME ?
as in you need it to keep others out?
that isn;t my personal computer so I cannot tweak it's security settings
